About this

I designed this site to be responsive, HTML5 validated, CSS validated (ignoring some experimental Chrome attributes), optimized for accessibility, with minimal JavaScript enhancements.

I'm a Front-End Developer with strong interests in UX and design. I'm also currently a Dev Bootcamp student in the Localhost pilot cohort in Columbus, Oh.
